# CUTSCENE::SET_CAN_DISPLAY_MINIMAP_DURING_CUTSCENE_THIS_UPDATE

## Summary
Allow the Minimap to be displayed this update.  Cutscene must have been started with CUTSCENE_NO_WIDESCREEN_BORDERS to work
